title: Timeline
desc: Markable events in project WCode's lifetime
content:
11 Apr 2013 - Project live on crowdfunding site: IndieGoGo.com
 10 Apr 2013 - Posted introduction video on Youtube
 31 Jan 2013 - Published site on facebook
 13 Oct 2012 - Registered Domain WCodes.org
 24 Sep 2012 - First Public mention of Base-1024 WCodes
